scripts.start:dev-mock: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATA_SOURCE=mock NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve
scripts.start:dev-backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATA_SOURCE=backend NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve
scripts.start:prod-mock: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DATA_SOURCE=mock NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve
scripts.start:prod-backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DATA_SOURCE=backend NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve
scripts.start-analyzer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ANALYZE=1 DATA_SOURCE=mock NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve
scripts.start-unused: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNUSED=1 DATA_SOURCE=mock NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve
scripts.start-smp: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SMP=1 ATA_SOURCE=mock NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve
scripts.build-analyzer: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ANALYZE=1  DATA_SOURCE=mock NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack
scripts.build-smp: cross-env NODE_ENV=production SMP=1 DATA_SOURCE=mock NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack
